In Somalia, ten people are dead after a suicide attack targets officials...
In the Philippines, one person was killed and two others wounded...
...in a shootout inside a fast food restaurant.
Two passenger trains in Switzerland collide, injuring five people, one seriously...
In Venezuela, government officials arrest opposition Caracas mayor Antonio Ledezma...
...on suspicion of planning a coup to overthrow the Venezuelan president.
And finally from Ukraine, Kiev residents paid tribute Thursday...
...to the people who lost their lives during the Maidan Square uprising a year ago.
